sources.title: Popeye Meets Rip Van Winkle (1941)
sources.description: Rip Van Winkle is being thrown out for nonpayment of rent (for twenty years). Popeye happens by and carts the sleeper home, but soon discovers that Rip has a sleepwalking problem that gets both of them into some trouble with some dwarves. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/popeye-meets-rip-van-winkle-1941/

metadata.Plot: Rip Van Winkle is being thrown out for nonpayment of rent (for 20 years). Popeye happens by and carts the sleeper home, but he soon discovers that Rip has a sleep-walking problem that gets both of them into some trouble with some dwarves.
